snippet: State geologists have tied quakes in a geologic formation deep under the Appalachians to gas drilling, leading Ohio to issue new permit conditions on Friday in certain areas.
abstract: Ohio geologists link earthquakes in geologic formation deep under Appalachians to gas drilling, leading Ohio to issue new permit conditions in certain areas.
lead_paragraph: State geologists have tied quakes in a geologic formation deep under the Appalachians to gas drilling, leading Ohio to issue new permit conditions on Friday in certain areas.

headline.main: Ohio: Geologists Link Earthquakes to Gas Drilling
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Geologists Link Earthquakes to Gas Drilling
